title: What will you accomplish today?
inputPlaceholder: Describe a task and let AI handle the rest

repoOnboardingChecklist.title: Repo Onboarding Checklist
repoOnboardingChecklist.description: Summarize setup, scripts, and architecture from a new codebase.
repoOnboardingChecklist.prompt: Scan this repository and create an onboarding checklist for a new engineer: setup steps, key scripts, architecture map, and first good issues.

prReviewAssistant.title: PR Review Assistant
prReviewAssistant.description: Review a pull request for bugs, risks, and test gaps.
prReviewAssistant.prompt: Review this PR diff and produce a severity-ranked list of issues, regression risks, and missing tests with file references.

bugReproPlan.title: Bug Repro Plan
bugReproPlan.description: Turn a bug ticket into reproducible steps and hypotheses.
bugReproPlan.prompt: Given this bug ticket, generate exact reproduction steps, likely root-cause hypotheses, and a minimal debugging checklist.

apiContractDiff.title: API Contract Diff
apiContractDiff.description: Compare API versions and identify breaking changes.
apiContractDiff.prompt: Compare API v1 and v2 specs and output a migration report: breaking changes, safe defaults, and required client updates.

testFailureTriage.title: Test Failure Triage
testFailureTriage.description: Cluster failing tests and propose high-confidence fixes.
testFailureTriage.prompt: Analyze current CI test failures, group by root cause, and propose the smallest safe fix plan with commands to validate.

releaseNotesFromCommits.title: Release Notes From Commits
releaseNotesFromCommits.description: Convert commit history into clean release notes.
releaseNotesFromCommits.prompt: Generate release notes from the last two weeks of commits grouped by feature, fix, and breaking change with user-facing language.

promptEvalBatch.title: Prompt Eval Batch
promptEvalBatch.description: Run a structured eval matrix for assistant prompts.
promptEvalBatch.prompt: Create a prompt evaluation matrix with 20 test cases, expected outputs, scoring rubric, and failure categories for my assistant.

aiSupportCopilot.title: AI Support Copilot
aiSupportCopilot.description: Draft response templates for recurring support issues.
aiSupportCopilot.prompt: Analyze recent support threads and create reusable response templates plus escalation rules for common issues.

ragKnowledgeCleanup.title: RAG Knowledge Cleanup
ragKnowledgeCleanup.description: Detect stale docs and propose refresh priorities.
ragKnowledgeCleanup.prompt: Audit our knowledge base for stale or duplicate docs and produce a ranked cleanup plan with owners and deadlines.

agentRunbookDraft.title: Agent Runbook Draft
agentRunbookDraft.description: Create an operational runbook for a production agent.
agentRunbookDraft.prompt: Draft an on-call runbook for this AI agent: health checks, rollback steps, common incidents, and recovery commands.

internWeekPlan.title: Intern Week Plan
internWeekPlan.description: Build a practical week-by-week intern onboarding plan.
internWeekPlan.prompt: Create a 6-week intern onboarding plan with project milestones, mentorship checkpoints, and measurable outcomes.

internPortfolioReview.title: Intern Portfolio Review
internPortfolioReview.description: Evaluate intern projects and provide feedback.
internPortfolioReview.prompt: Review these intern project summaries and write feedback on code quality, impact, and next-step recommendations.

internProjectScoping.title: Intern Project Scoping
internProjectScoping.description: Define intern-safe projects with clear acceptance criteria.
internProjectScoping.prompt: Propose 5 intern-friendly engineering projects with scope, constraints, acceptance criteria, and risk level.

internBugBash.title: Intern Bug Bash
internBugBash.description: Generate a guided bug bash sheet for interns.
internBugBash.prompt: Create a bug bash checklist for interns with feature areas, test scenarios, severity labels, and report template.

internDemoPrep.title: Intern Demo Prep
internDemoPrep.description: Prepare a polished intern demo narrative and slides.
internDemoPrep.prompt: Turn this intern project into a demo script and slide outline: problem, implementation, results, lessons learned, and next steps.
